summary: On their wedding night, Bob reveals to Betty that he has purchased an abandoned chicken farm. Betty struggles to adapt to their new rural lifestyle, especially when a glamorous neighbor seems to set her eyes on Bob.

Hinds|Esther Dale|Elisabeth Risdon|John Berkes|Victor Potel|Fuzzy Knight|Isabel O'Madigan|Dorothy Vaughan|John Alban|Colleen Alpaugh|Polly Bailey|William Bailey|Jack Baxley|Vangie Beilby|Hank Bell|Carl Bennett|Earl Bennett|Joseph E. title: El huevo y yo
